summary: Previous issues were addressed: 404/202 are now handled via getUsage returning null and USD-to-cents conversion uses rounding.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: getUsage() errors (404/202) not handled, causing incorrect retries instead of deferring to reaper
previous_issues_status.notes: Worker now treats not-found/in-progress as null (per comment), so it logs and defers to reaper rather than retrying. This resolves the issue even though handling is moved to the client.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Unsafe float conversion for cents leading to financial inaccuracies
previous_issues_status.notes: Conversion now uses Math.round(usage.costUsd * 100) before finalize and logging.
